moral: Everyone in a community is important because they help make our home safe, healthy, and happy. We can all help others, too!

segments.name: segment_1
segments.SUMMARY: The story introduces what a community is and explains that helpers make communities better places.
segments.REASONING: Pages 1-2 serve as the introduction, explaining the concept of a community and setting up the main idea that helpers play an important role. This is a natural segment because it frames the rest of the book.

segments.name: segment_2
segments.SUMMARY: The story lists different helpers and explains how builders help build homes, roads, and other important places using special machines.
segments.REASONING: Pages 3-5 shift focus to specific community helpers and highlight builders in detail, marking a new event development. The segment ends after the builder's tools are described.

segments.name: segment_3
segments.SUMMARY: This part describes helpers who make sure we have electricity and clean waterâ€”electricians and plumbers.
segments.REASONING: Pages 6-7 group two types of helpers whose jobs involve household necessities. The segment is unified by the theme of essential services.

segments.name: segment_4
segments.SUMMARY: This section focuses on different helpers at school, including teachers, librarians, crossing guards, bus drivers, nurses, principals, and caretakers.
segments.REASONING: Pages 8-11 have a school-themed set of helpers, providing a clear event and setting change. This grouping makes sense as the helpers are all connected to the school environment.

segments.name: segment_5
segments.SUMMARY: These pages introduce medical helpers like doctors, nurses, and dentists, explaining how they help keep us healthy.
segments.REASONING: Pages 12-13 focus on health-related helpers, including a special page for dentists, showing a natural topic transition.

segments.name: segment_6
segments.SUMMARY: This segment describes emergency helpers such as paramedics, firefighters, and police officers, and how they keep us safe and help in emergencies.
segments.REASONING: Pages 14-18 all discuss emergency and safety helpers who protect the community, forming a logical group unified by their roles in urgent or dangerous situations.

segments.name: segment_7
segments.SUMMARY: The story ends by introducing volunteers and encourages children to become helpers, too.
segments.REASONING: Pages 19-20 transition to the idea that anyone, even kids, can help by volunteering, providing a hopeful and interactive ending distinct from the previous segments.
